This test checks that shifting an abspos container will properly repaint its descendants.
The images below should be correctly repainted.
  
(GraphicsLayer
  (bounds 1250.00 585.00)
  (children 1
    (GraphicsLayer
      (bounds 1250.00 585.00)
      (contentsOpaque 1)
      (drawsContent 1)
      (repaint rects
        (rect 0.00 0.00 1500.00 237.00)
        (rect 0.00 0.00 1250.00 237.00)
      )
    )
  )
)
